length.description: The length of the string desired. The minimum value for length is 1 and, length must also be >= (`Min Upper` + `Min Lower` + `Min Numeric` + `Min Special`).

special.description: If true, include special characters in the result.

upper.description: Include special characters in the result. These are !@#$%&*()-_=+[]{}<>:?.

lower.description: Include lowercase letters in the result.

numeric.description: Include numeric characters in the result.

override_special.description: Supply a string of characters that will be used to override the default character set. The `Special` attribute must be true for this attribute to be used.

keepers.description: Supply a string of characters that will be used to override the default character set. The `Special` attribute must be true for this attribute to be used.

min_lower.description: The minimum number of lowercase letters in the result.

min_upper.description: The minimum number of uppercase letters in the result.

min_numeric.description: The minimum number of numeric characters in the result.

min_special.description: The minimum number of special characters in the result.
